subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The California State Athletic Commission changed its original decision on the James Toney-Hasim Rahman fight from a technical knockout to a no decision. Toney stopped Rahman in the third round on July 16 in Temecula after Rahman told the ringside doctor that he could not continue because of a cut over his left eye.
